name: Prodigal Daughters
description:
This game is a project for Game Development 115. The assignment consisted of creating a top-down 2D game in the JRPG style within 9 weeks using GB Studio. Unfortunately I ran out of time to complete the full game, but Part 1 is completely playable with a *mysterious* cliffhanger. 

My favorite aspect in the creation of Prodigal Daughters was designing the narrative and writing dialogue, but I also had a blast making pixel art and doing level design. Besides using some example character sprites (courtesy of Chris Maltby), I also created all of the artwork. 

I hope to one day complete Prodigal Daughters for a full, unified narrative experience!

Controls: 
To move = WASD
Press button = J
